title: Create Maui Lane Care Home logo and apply as app logo + icon

requirements.text: Generate an updated Maui Lane Care Home brand logo image and store it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, suitable for use in the app header.

quotes: create a logo for Maui Lane Care Home and apply it as a logo and icon for the application

acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image file is generated in frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filename and dimensions from imageRequirements.edits

requirements.text: Generate an updated Maui Lane Care Home application icon image and store it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, suitable for use as the browser favicon.

quotes: create a logo for Maui Lane Care Home and apply it as a logo and icon for the application

acceptanceCriteria: A new app icon image file is generated in frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filename and dimensions from imageRequirements.edits

requirements.text: Apply the updated Maui Lane Care Home logo in the authenticated app header by updating the header logo image source in frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShell.tsx to use the newly generated logo asset.
acceptanceCriteria: When signed in, the MauiAppShell header displays the updated logo image
The header logo image has meaningful alt text in English (keep as "Maui Lane Care Home")

requirements.text: Apply the updated application icon as the site favicon by updating frontend/index.html to reference the newly generated app icon asset.

quotes: apply it as a ... icon for the application

acceptanceCriteria: The favicon <link> in frontend/index.html points to the updated icon asset
Reloading the app shows the updated favicon in the browser tab

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components).
Do not modify any files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not change backend logic or add backend endpoints.
Do not redesign unrelated UI screens beyond swapping in the new logo/icon assets.

edits: Refresh the Maui Lane Care Home logo with a clean, professional care-home brand mark (maui-lane-logo.dim_512x512.png > maui-lane-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png)
Refresh the Maui Lane Care Home app icon as a simplified version of the logo optimized for small sizes (maui-lane-app-icon.dim_256x256.png > maui-lane-app-icon-v2.dim_256x256.png)
